fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
eu_initiatives: Data Protection, Access to Finance, FSUG work on credit registers, Payment Services Directive, Capital Markets Union, AnaCredit, Retail Financial Services
organisation_name: Association of Consumer Credit Information Suppliers (ACCIS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Member of Eurofinas and International Committee on Credit Reporting (ICCR)
legal_status: International non-profit association under Belgian law
goals__remit:
The key functions of the ACCIS are: 
 
to represent, promote, protect and preserve the common interests of its members, and in particular with regard to international matters and questions arising in connection with the European Community. 
 
to attend to all matters which relate directly or indirectly to the interests of its members, to include in particular the representation and advocacy of member interests vis-a-vis government agencies, the public and all other third parties. 
 
to inform the members about matters of concern to them, including information about practices of other members. 
 
to co-ordinate the mutual interests of the members.
